text.ascii: janamejaya uvAca
text.ur: janamejaya uvāca

text.ascii: ya ete kIrtitA brahman ye cAnye nAnukIrtitAH
text.ud: य एते कीर्तिता ब्रह्मन्ये चान्ये नानुकीर्तिताः
text.ur: ya ete kīrtitā brahman ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ

text.ascii: samyak tAJ zrotum icchAmi rAjJaz cAnyAn suvarcasaH
text.ur: samyak tāñ śrotum icchāmi rājñaś cānyān suvarcasaḥ

text.ascii: yadartham iha saMbhUtA devakalpA mahArathAH
text.ur: yadartham iha saṁbhūtā devakalpā mahārathāḥ

text.ascii: bhuvi tan me mahAbhAga samyag AkhyAtum arhasi
text.ur: bhuvi tan me mahābhāga samyag ākhyātum arhasi

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: rahasyaM khalv idaM rAjan devAnAm iti naH zrutam
text.ur: rahasyaṁ khalv idaṁ rājan devānām iti naḥ śrutam

text.ascii: tat tu te kathayiSyAmi namaskRtvA svayaMbhuve
text.ur: tat tu te kathayiṣyāmi namaskr̥tvā svayaṁbhuve

text.ascii: triHsaptakRtvaH pRthivIM kRtvA niHkSatriyAM purA
text.ur: triḥsaptakr̥tvaḥ pr̥thivīṁ kr̥tvā niḥkṣatriyāṁ purā

text.ascii: jAmadagnyas tapas tepe mahendre parvatottame
text.ur: jāmadagnyas tapas tepe mahendre parvatottame

text.ascii: tadA niHkSatriye loke bhArgaveNa kRte sati
text.ud: तदा निःक्षत्रिये लोके भार्गवेण कृते सति
text.ur: tadā niḥkṣatriye loke bhārgaveṇa kr̥te sati

text.ascii: brAhmaNAn kSatriyA rAjan garbhArthinyo 'bhicakramuH
text.ur: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyā rājan garbhārthinyo ’bhicakramuḥ

text.ascii: tAbhiH saha samApetur brAhmaNAH saMzitavratAH
text.ur: tābhiḥ saha samāpetur brāhmaṇāḥ saṁśitavratāḥ

text.ascii: RtAv Rtau naravyAghra na kAmAn nAnRtau tathA
text.ur: r̥tāv r̥tau naravyāghra na kāmān nānr̥tau tathā

text.ascii: tebhyas tu lebhire garbhAn kSatriyAs tAH sahasrazaH
text.ur: tebhyas tu lebhire garbhān kṣatriyās tāḥ sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: tataH suSuvire rAjan kSatriyAn vIryasaMmatAn
text.ur: tataḥ suṣuvire rājan kṣatriyān vīryasaṁmatān

text.ascii: kumArAMz ca kumArIz ca punaH kSatrAbhivRddhaye
text.ur: kumārāṁś ca kumārīś ca punaḥ kṣatrābhivr̥ddhaye

text.ascii: evaM tad brAhmaNaiH kSatraM kSatriyAsu tapasvibhiH
text.ur: evaṁ tad brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatraṁ kṣatriyāsu tapasvibhiḥ

text.ascii: jAtam Rdhyata dharmeNa sudIrgheNAyuSAnvitam
text.ur: jātam r̥dhyata dharmeṇa sudīrgheṇāyuṣānvitam

text.ascii: catvAro 'pi tadA varNA babhUvur brAhmaNottarAH
text.ur: catvāro ’pi tadā varṇā babhūvur brāhmaṇottarāḥ

text.ascii: abhyagacchann Rtau nArIM na kAmAn nAnRtau tathA
text.ur: abhyagacchann r̥tau nārīṁ na kāmān nānr̥tau tathā

text.ascii: tathaivAnyAni bhUtAni tiryagyonigatAny api
text.ur: tathaivānyāni bhūtāni tiryagyonigatāny api

text.ascii: Rtau dArAMz ca gacchanti tadA sma bharatarSabha
text.ud: ऋतौ दारांश्च गच्छन्ति तदा स्म भरतर्षभ
text.ur: r̥tau dārāṁś ca gacchanti tadā sma bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: tato 'vardhanta dharmeNa sahasrazatajIvinaH
text.ur: tato ’vardhanta dharmeṇa sahasraśatajīvinaḥ

text.ascii: tAH prajAH pRthivIpAla dharmavrataparAyaNAH
text.ur: tāḥ prajāḥ pr̥thivīpāla dharmavrataparāyaṇāḥ

text.ascii: Adhibhir vyAdhibhiz caiva vimuktAH sarvazo narAH
text.ur: ādhibhir vyādhibhiś caiva vimuktāḥ sarvaśo narāḥ

text.ascii: athemAM sAgarApAGgAM gAM gajendragatAkhilAm
text.ur: athemāṁ sāgarāpāṅgāṁ gāṁ gajendragatākhilām

text.ascii: adhyatiSThat punaH kSatraM sazailavanakAnanAm
text.ur: adhyatiṣṭhat punaḥ kṣatraṁ saśailavanakānanām

text.ascii: prazAsati punaH kSatre dharmeNemAM vasuMdharAm
text.ur: praśāsati punaḥ kṣatre dharmeṇemāṁ vasuṁdharām

text.ascii: brAhmaNAdyAs tadA varNA lebhire mudam uttamAm
text.ur: brāhmaṇādyās tadā varṇā lebhire mudam uttamām

text.ascii: kAmakrodhodbhavAn doSAn nirasya ca narAdhipAH
text.ur: kāmakrodhodbhavān doṣān nirasya ca narādhipāḥ

text.ascii: daNDaM daNDyeSu dharmeNa praNayanto 'nvapAlayan
text.ur: daṇḍaṁ daṇḍyeṣu dharmeṇa praṇayanto ’nvapālayan

text.ascii: tathA dharmapare kSatre sahasrAkSaH zatakratuH
text.ur: tathā dharmapare kṣatre sahasrākṣaḥ śatakratuḥ

text.ascii: svAdu deze ca kAle ca vavarSApyAyayan prajAH
text.ud: स्वादु देशे च काले च ववर्षाप्याययन्प्रजाः
text.ur: svādu deśe ca kāle ca vavarṣāpyāyayan prajāḥ

text.ascii: na bAla eva mriyate tadA kaz cin narAdhipa
text.ud: न बाल एव म्रियते तदा कश्चिन्नराधिप
text.ur: na bāla eva mriyate tadā kaś cin narādhipa

text.ascii: na ca striyaM prajAnAti kaz cid aprAptayauvanaH
text.ur: na ca striyaṁ prajānāti kaś cid aprāptayauvanaḥ

text.ascii: evam AyuSmatIbhis tu prajAbhir bharatarSabha
text.ur: evam āyuṣmatībhis tu prajābhir bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: iyaM sAgaraparyantA samApUryata medinI
text.ur: iyaṁ sāgaraparyantā samāpūryata medinī

text.ascii: Ijire ca mahAyajJaiH kSatriyA bahudakSiNaiH
text.ur: ījire ca mahāyajñaiḥ kṣatriyā bahudakṣiṇaiḥ

text.ascii: sAGgopaniSadAn vedAn viprAz cAdhIyate tadA
text.ur: sāṅgopaniṣadān vedān viprāś cādhīyate tadā

text.ascii: na ca vikrINate brahma brAhmaNAH sma tadA nRpa
text.ud: न च विक्रीणते ब्रह्म ब्राह्मणाः स्म तदा नृप
text.ur: na ca vikrīṇate brahma brāhmaṇāḥ sma tadā nr̥pa

text.ascii: na ca zUdrasamAbhyAze vedAn uccArayanty uta
text.ur: na ca śūdrasamābhyāśe vedān uccārayanty uta

text.ascii: kArayantaH kRSiM gobhis tathA vaizyAH kSitAv iha
text.ur: kārayantaḥ kr̥ṣiṁ gobhis tathā vaiśyāḥ kṣitāv iha

text.ascii: na gAm ayuJjanta dhuri kRzAGgAz cApy ajIvayan
text.ur: na gām ayuñjanta dhuri kr̥śāṅgāś cāpy ajīvayan

text.ascii: phenapAMz ca tathA vatsAn na duhanti sma mAnavAH
text.ud: फेनपांश्च तथा वत्सान्न दुहन्ति स्म मानवाः
text.ur: phenapāṁś ca tathā vatsān na duhanti sma mānavāḥ

text.ascii: na kUTamAnair vaNijaH paNyaM vikrINate tadA
text.ur: na kūṭamānair vaṇijaḥ paṇyaṁ vikrīṇate tadā

text.ascii: karmANi ca naravyAghra dharmopetAni mAnavAH
text.ur: karmāṇi ca naravyāghra dharmopetāni mānavāḥ

text.ascii: dharmam evAnupazyantaz cakrur dharmaparAyaNAH
text.ur: dharmam evānupaśyantaś cakrur dharmaparāyaṇāḥ

text.ascii: svakarmaniratAz cAsan sarve varNA narAdhipa
text.ur: svakarmaniratāś cāsan sarve varṇā narādhipa

text.ascii: evaM tadA naravyAghra dharmo na hrasate kva cit
text.ud: एवं तदा नरव्याघ्र धर्मो न ह्रसते क्वचित्
text.ur: evaṁ tadā naravyāghra dharmo na hrasate kva cit

text.ascii: kAle gAvaH prasUyante nAryaz ca bharatarSabha
text.ur: kāle gāvaḥ prasūyante nāryaś ca bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: phalanty RtuSu vRkSAz ca puSpANi ca phalAni ca
text.ud: फलन्त्यृतुषु वृक्षाश्च पुष्पाणि च फलानि च
text.ur: phalanty r̥tuṣu vr̥kṣāś ca puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca

text.ascii: evaM kRtayuge samyag vartamAne tadA nRpa
text.ur: evaṁ kr̥tayuge samyag vartamāne tadā nr̥pa

text.ascii: ApUryata mahI kRtsnA prANibhir bahubhir bhRzam
text.ur: āpūryata mahī kr̥tsnā prāṇibhir bahubhir bhr̥śam

text.ascii: tataH samudite loke mAnuSe bharatarSabha
text.ur: tataḥ samudite loke mānuṣe bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: asurA jajJire kSetre rAjJAM manujapuMgava
text.ur: asurā jajñire kṣetre rājñāṁ manujapuṁgava

text.ascii: Adityair hi tadA daityA bahuzo nirjitA yudhi
text.ud: आदित्यैर्हि तदा दैत्या बहुशो निर्जिता युधि
text.ur: ādityair hi tadā daityā bahuśo nirjitā yudhi

text.ascii: aizvaryAd bhraMzitAz cApi saMbabhUvuH kSitAv iha
text.ur: aiśvaryād bhraṁśitāś cāpi saṁbabhūvuḥ kṣitāv iha

text.ascii: iha devatvam icchanto mAnuSeSu manasvinaH
text.ur: iha devatvam icchanto mānuṣeṣu manasvinaḥ

text.ascii: jajJire bhuvi bhUteSu teSu teSv asurA vibho
text.ud: जज्ञिरे भुवि भूतेषु तेषु तेष्वसुरा विभो
text.ur: jajñire bhuvi bhūteṣu teṣu teṣv asurā vibho

text.ascii: goSv azveSu ca rAjendra kharoSTramahiSeSu ca
text.ur: goṣv aśveṣu ca rājendra kharoṣṭramahiṣeṣu ca

text.ascii: kravyAdeSu ca bhUteSu gajeSu ca mRgeSu ca
text.ud: क्रव्यादेषु च भूतेषु गजेषु च मृगेषु च
text.ur: kravyādeṣu ca bhūteṣu gajeṣu ca mr̥geṣu ca

text.ascii: jAtair iha mahIpAla jAyamAnaiz ca tair mahI
text.ur: jātair iha mahīpāla jāyamānaiś ca tair mahī

text.ascii: na zazAkAtmanAtmAnam iyaM dhArayituM dharA
text.ur: na śaśākātmanātmānam iyaṁ dhārayituṁ dharā

text.ascii: atha jAtA mahIpAlAH ke cid balasamanvitAH
text.ur: atha jātā mahīpālāḥ ke cid balasamanvitāḥ

text.ascii: diteH putrA danoz caiva tasmAl lokAd iha cyutAH
text.ur: diteḥ putrā danoś caiva tasmāl lokād iha cyutāḥ

text.ascii: vIryavanto 'valiptAs te nAnArUpadharA mahIm
text.ur: vīryavanto ’valiptās te nānārūpadharā mahīm

text.ascii: imAM sAgaraparyantAM parIyur arimardanAH
text.ur: imāṁ sāgaraparyantāṁ parīyur arimardanāḥ

text.ascii: brAhmaNAn kSatriyAn vaizyAJ zUdrAMz caivApy apIDayan
text.ur: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṁś caivāpy apīḍayan

text.ascii: anyAni caiva bhUtAni pIDayAm Asur ojasA
text.ur: anyāni caiva bhūtāni pīḍayām āsur ojasā

text.ascii: trAsayanto vinighnantas tAMs tAn bhUtagaNAMz ca te
text.ur: trāsayanto vinighnantas tāṁs tān bhūtagaṇāṁś ca te

text.ascii: viceruH sarvato rAjan mahIM zatasahasrazaH
text.ur: viceruḥ sarvato rājan mahīṁ śatasahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: AzramasthAn maharSIMz ca dharSayantas tatas tataH
text.ur: āśramasthān maharṣīṁś ca dharṣayantas tatas tataḥ

text.ascii: abrahmaNyA vIryamadA mattA madabalena ca
text.ur: abrahmaṇyā vīryamadā mattā madabalena ca

text.ascii: evaM vIryabalotsiktair bhUr iyaM tair mahAsuraiH
text.ur: evaṁ vīryabalotsiktair bhūr iyaṁ tair mahāsuraiḥ

text.ascii: pIDyamAnA mahIpAla brahmANam upacakrame
text.ur: pīḍyamānā mahīpāla brahmāṇam upacakrame

text.ascii: na hImAM pavano rAjan na nAgA na nagA mahIm
text.ud: न हीमां पवनो राजन्न नागा न नगा महीम्
text.ur: na hīmāṁ pavano rājan na nāgā na nagā mahīm

text.ascii: tadA dhArayituM zekur AkrAntAM dAnavair balAt
text.ur: tadā dhārayituṁ śekur ākrāntāṁ dānavair balāt

text.ascii: tato mahI mahIpAla bhArArtA bhayapIDitA
text.ur: tato mahī mahīpāla bhārārtā bhayapīḍitā

text.ascii: jagAma zaraNaM devaM sarvabhUtapitAmaham
text.ur: jagāma śaraṇaṁ devaṁ sarvabhūtapitāmaham

text.ascii: sA saMvRtaM mahAbhAgair devadvijamaharSibhiH
text.ur: sā saṁvr̥taṁ mahābhāgair devadvijamaharṣibhiḥ

text.ascii: dadarza devaM brahmANaM lokakartAram avyayam
text.ur: dadarśa devaṁ brahmāṇaṁ lokakartāram avyayam

text.ascii: gandharvair apsarobhiz ca bandikarmasu niSThitaiH
text.ur: gandharvair apsarobhiś ca bandikarmasu niṣṭhitaiḥ

text.ascii: vandyamAnaM mudopetair vavande cainam etya sA
text.ur: vandyamānaṁ mudopetair vavande cainam etya sā

text.ascii: atha vijJApayAm Asa bhUmis taM zaraNArthinI
text.ur: atha vijñāpayām āsa bhūmis taṁ śaraṇārthinī

text.ascii: saMnidhau lokapAlAnAM sarveSAm eva bhArata
text.ur: saṁnidhau lokapālānāṁ sarveṣām eva bhārata

text.ascii: tat pradhAnAtmanas tasya bhUmeH kRtyaM svayaMbhuvaH
text.ur: tat pradhānātmanas tasya bhūmeḥ kr̥tyaṁ svayaṁbhuvaḥ

text.ascii: pUrvam evAbhavad rAjan viditaM parameSThinaH
text.ur: pūrvam evābhavad rājan viditaṁ parameṣṭhinaḥ

text.ascii: sraSTA hi jagataH kasmAn na saMbudhyeta bhArata
text.ud: स्रष्टा हि जगतः कस्मान्न संबुध्येत भारत
text.ur: sraṣṭā hi jagataḥ kasmān na saṁbudhyeta bhārata

text.ascii: surAsurANAM lokAnAm azeSeNa manogatam
text.ur: surāsurāṇāṁ lokānām aśeṣeṇa manogatam

text.ascii: tAm uvAca mahArAja bhUmiM bhUmipatir vibhuH
text.ur: tām uvāca mahārāja bhūmiṁ bhūmipatir vibhuḥ

text.ascii: prabhavaH sarvabhUtAnAm IzaH zaMbhuH prajApatiH
text.ur: prabhavaḥ sarvabhūtānām īśaḥ śaṁbhuḥ prajāpatiḥ

text.ascii: yadartham asi saMprAptA matsakAzaM vasuMdhare
text.ur: yadartham asi saṁprāptā matsakāśaṁ vasuṁdhare

text.ascii: tadarthaM saMniyokSyAmi sarvAn eva divaukasaH
text.ur: tadarthaṁ saṁniyokṣyāmi sarvān eva divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: ity uktvA sa mahIM devo brahmA rAjan visRjya ca
text.ud: इत्युक्त्वा स महीं देवो ब्रह्मा राजन्विसृज्य च
text.ur: ity uktvā sa mahīṁ devo brahmā rājan visr̥jya ca

text.ascii: Adideza tadA sarvAn vibudhAn bhUtakRt svayam
text.ur: ādideśa tadā sarvān vibudhān bhūtakr̥t svayam

text.ascii: asyA bhUmer nirasituM bhAraM bhAgaiH pRthak pRthak
text.ur: asyā bhūmer nirasituṁ bhāraṁ bhāgaiḥ pr̥thak pr̥thak

text.ascii: asyAm eva prasUyadhvaM virodhAyeti cAbravIt
text.ur: asyām eva prasūyadhvaṁ virodhāyeti cābravīt

text.ascii: tathaiva ca samAnIya gandharvApsarasAM gaNAn
text.ur: tathaiva ca samānīya gandharvāpsarasāṁ gaṇān

text.ascii: uvAca bhagavAn sarvAn idaM vacanam uttamam
text.ur: uvāca bhagavān sarvān idaṁ vacanam uttamam

text.ascii: svair aMzaiH saMprasUyadhvaM yatheSTaM mAnuSeSv iti
text.ur: svair aṁśaiḥ saṁprasūyadhvaṁ yatheṣṭaṁ mānuṣeṣv iti

text.ascii: atha zakrAdayaH sarve zrutvA suraguror vacaH
text.ur: atha śakrādayaḥ sarve śrutvā suraguror vacaḥ

text.ascii: tathyam arthyaM ca pathyaM ca tasya te jagRhus tadA
text.ud: तथ्यमर्थ्यं च पथ्यं च तस्य ते जगृहुस्तदा
text.ur: tathyam arthyaṁ ca pathyaṁ ca tasya te jagr̥hus tadā

text.ascii: atha te sarvazo 'MzaiH svair gantuM bhUmiM kRtakSaNAH
text.ud: अथ ते सर्वशोंऽशैः स्वैर्गन्तुं भूमिं कृतक्षणाः
text.ur: atha te sarvaśo ’ṁśaiḥ svair gantuṁ bhūmiṁ kr̥takṣaṇāḥ

text.ascii: nArAyaNam amitraghnaM vaikuNTham upacakramuH
text.ur: nārāyaṇam amitraghnaṁ vaikuṇṭham upacakramuḥ

text.ascii: yaH sa cakragadApANiH pItavAsAsitaprabhaH
text.ur: yaḥ sa cakragadāpāṇiḥ pītavāsāsitaprabhaḥ

text.ascii: padmanAbhaH surArighnaH pRthucArvaJcitekSaNaH
text.ur: padmanābhaḥ surārighnaḥ pr̥thucārvañcitekṣaṇaḥ

text.ascii: taM bhuvaH zodhanAyendra uvAca puruSottamam
text.ur: taṁ bhuvaḥ śodhanāyendra uvāca puruṣottamam

text.ascii: aMzenAvatarasveti tathety Aha ca taM hariH
text.ur: aṁśenāvatarasveti tathety āha ca taṁ hariḥ
